name: api-know
description: API Know provides an easy interface to perform CRUD operations against APIs, localstorage, etc..

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build-dist: npm run build && webpack && uglifyjs --in-source-map dist/api-know.js.map -s dist/api-know.js -o dist/api-know.min.js

author: Mishkin Faustini <mishkinf@gmail.com>
